name: Everlytic for WooCommerce
author: Everlytic

sections.description:
Integrate with Everlytic

What you can do with this plugin

  • Connect your WooCommerce store with Everlytic.
  • Send abandoned cart emails.
  • Pull your products directly into the Everlytic builder for easy mailer design.
  • Create ecommerce workflows.
  • Sync your contacts between WooCommerce and Everlytic.
  • Insert your coupons directly from your store into the Everlytic Builder.
  • Trigger a workflow when a customer purchases from your store.
sections.installation:
Before You Start

Here are some things to know before you begin this process.
– This plugin requires you to have the WooCommerce plugin already installed and activated in WordPress.
– Your hosting environment must meet WooCommerce’s minimum requirements, including PHP 7.0 or greater.
– WP_CRON must be activated with your hosting provider to sync data. Please verify that it is enabled.

Getting Started

Youâ€™ll need to do a few things to connect your WooCommerce store to Everlytic.
– Download the plugin.
– Install the plugin on your WordPress Admin site.
– Connect to your store from Everlytic. Visit the Guide
